title: Act three (-1 day) what does that mean??
body: Why have a -1 day?? cant you just make the day countdown longer? unless theres some problem with release, but there has been no announcement and there has been a whole week just passed with nothing happening in it, for problems to be worked out during that time, so what does -1 day mean? does it mean when it comes out it remains 1 day longer? I'm so confused.

replies.body: it probably meant you had to relog so it would activate xD Its up now
They missed the deadline yet they can't be bothered re-coding it because they are looking forward to a close release
